data.title: Manhattan Construction Group
data.meta_description: Manhattan Construction Group is a privately-held firm that provides general building, bridge, road, civil, pipeline, and specialty construction services.
data.text:
Our Company.

Manhattan Construction Group is a privately-held construction firm that provides general building, bridge, road, civil works, pipeline, and specialty construction services in the United States, Central America, Mexico, and the Caribbean.

For more than 125 years, we have grown our construction firm by delivering on our promises, fostering lasting client relationships, and investing in the professional development of our team members.

Throughout our five generations of family ownership, we continually seek to build a company that makes a positive contribution to the communities in which we build.

We pride ourselves on our uncompromising commitment to ethical conduct, safety and making fiscally-sound business decisions to meet the long-term goals of our clients, project team members, and collaborators.

We strive for “Building excellence” in every aspect of our business.

History

Under the ownership and management of the Rooney family for five generations, Manhattan team members focus on the timeless qualities of building trust while providing exceptional construction services. This blueprint for business has guided the company through more than a century of market fluctuations. Founded in 1896, Manhattan Construction Company is the flagship of the organization. After becoming well known in the general construction field, Manhattan Construction Group was formed to serve as the parent company of Manhattan Construction Company and affiliate operations catering to multiple segments of the building industry. Today, Manhattan Construction Group also includes Manhattan Road & Bridge Company, Manhattan International, Manhattan Pipeline, LLC, Cantera Construction Company, SAFEZONE, LLC, and Spectrum Contracting.

Ethics

Doing the right thing.

With more than a century of experience and accomplishments in our businesses by exceptional people, we have established a reputation of integrity and fairness, reliable performance, and quality results. We are uncompromising in upholding the highest business ethics. We deal fairly and honestly with others. We comply with all laws and regulations. We do what is right by acting in accordance with our company values. We feel that there is no substitute for the exercise of sound judgment based on the principles of forthrightness and integrity. Our team members have a duty to build upon these company values. Together, we continue to demonstrate that Manhattan Construction Group stands for the highest standards of integrity and fairness by “Doing the Right Thing.”

Commitment to Legal and Ethical Conduct

Consistent with our core values, honesty, and fair dealing are central to maintaining the Company’s customer relationships and reputation. We are committed to operating at the highest ethical standards and in compliance with applicable law while providing an exceptional experience for our customers. Our ability to do so depends on the demonstrated conduct and commitment of each and every team member. We integrate these standards into every aspect of our business.

Our Ethics Hotline
